mdRecord.dcterms:description: An annex to the State House was constructed between 1902 and 1906 under the supervision of Baltimore architects Baldwin & Pennington; the new annex replaced earlier 19th-century annexes. -- https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Maryland_State_House [work]
